title: United States presidents and Mubārak banner
description: Banner comparing the longevity of Ḥusnī Mubārak's Egyptian presidency to United States' presidents' terms of office. Phototgraphers' description: Photographs of protesters in Tahrir revolting against Mubarak carrying signs and forming crowds. Some are revealing the martys clothes and photos.. Text in image: 40. Ronald Regan 1981-1989; 41. George H. W. Bush 1983-1993; 42. Bill Clinton 1993-2001; 43. George W. Bush 2001-2009; 44. Barak Obama 2009-.
name: Bush, George, 1924-; Bush, George W. (George Walker), 1946-; Clinton, Bill, 1946-; Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928- ; Obama, Barack; Regan, Ronald J.
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Foreign relations; Political violence; Protest movements; Revolutions; United States
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
